name: FoxEntityHelper
description: Provides specialized methods for interacting with Fox entities, including variant checks, trust relationships, and behavioral state detection.

constructors.description: Creates a new FoxEntityHelper wrapper for the given Fox entity.

methods.name: getItemInMouth
methods.description: Returns the item currently in this fox's mouth.

methods.name: isSnowFox
methods.description: Returns whether this fox is a snow fox variant.

methods.name: isRedFox
methods.description: Returns whether this fox is a red fox variant.

methods.name: getOwner
methods.description: Returns the UUID string of this fox's first owner, or null if it has no owner.

methods.name: getSecondOwner
methods.description: Returns the UUID string of this fox's second owner, or null if it has no second owner.

methods.name: canTrust
methods.description: Returns whether this fox trusts the given entity based on ownership.

parameters.name: entity
parameters.description: The entity to check trust relationship with

methods.name: hasFoundTarget
methods.description: Returns whether this fox is preparing its jump (has found a target).

methods.name: isSitting
methods.description: Returns whether this fox is currently sitting.

methods.name: isWandering
methods.description: Returns whether this fox is wandering around.

methods.name: isSleeping
methods.description: Returns whether this fox is currently sleeping.

methods.name: isDefending
methods.description: Returns whether this fox is defending another fox.

methods.name: isPouncing
methods.description: Returns whether this fox is just before its leap (pouncing).

methods.name: isJumping
methods.description: Returns whether this fox is currently jumping.

methods.name: isSneaking
methods.description: Returns whether this fox is sneaking in preparation of an attack.
